job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We're a fast-growing startup with big ambitions looking for someone to join our engineering team and drive the advancement of our tech stack and infrastructure. We are seeking a Backend Engineer with some knowledge of DevOps (or a willingness to learn) to join our talented team. You will play a crucial role in building, scaling and maintaining our backend infrastructure that is used to serve our AI capabilities while contributing to product development, including launching new features and services from scratch. You are sure to be challenged with exciting challenges on a daily basis.

   At Engaige we are building the platform that enables businesses to build, maintain and grow individually-tailored relationships with their customers efficiently at scale. Our platform centralizes all company specific information, ranging from general information and real-time customer data to company policies, while providing full visibility and control over AI decision-making. This approach enables businesses to deploy highly capable AI agents reliably, creating a new standard in customer experience.

   What You'll Do:
     * Build from scratch: Contribute to the development of new features and products. Bring your ideas and those of your team to life by designing and implementing backend services that drive our platform forward.
     * Architect & optimize: Help scale our architecture, including cloud-based services, REST APIs, and logging frameworks, ensuring high performance and reliability as we grow across multiple regions and workloads.
     * DevOps integration: Be hands-on with our DevOps setup, streamlining deployments, monitoring systems, and optimizing infrastructure for reliability and efficiency using cloud-based tools and CI/CD workflows.
     * Collaborate on technical roadmaps: Participate in designing the technical roadmap, working closely with the CTO and other engineers to shape the future of our product and backend ecosystem.
     * Security and monitoring: Ensure our systems are secure and robust by integrating monitoring and security tools, maintaining CI/CD pipelines, and implementing best practices for system reliability.

   Tech Stack You'll Be Working With:
     * Cloud platforms and deployment tools
     * FastAPI, React
     * Database technologies (e.g., PostgreSQL, Redis)
     * LLM providers
     * Monitoring and CI/CD tools (e.g., GitHub Actions, CodeCov)
     * REST APIs, Webhooks
job_details.full_text:
Medior Backend Engineer

We're a fast-growing startup with big ambitions looking for someone to join our engineering team and drive the advancement of our tech stack and infrastructure. We are seeking a Backend Engineer with some knowledge of DevOps (or a willingness to learn) to join our talented team. You will play a crucial role in building, scaling and maintaining our backend infrastructure that is used to serve our AI capabilities while contributing to product development, including launching new features and services from scratch. You are sure to be challenged with exciting challenges on a daily basis.

   At Engaige we are building the platform that enables businesses to build, maintain and grow individually-tailored relationships with their customers efficiently at scale. Our platform centralizes all company specific information, ranging from general information and real-time customer data to company policies, while providing full visibility and control over AI decision-making. This approach enables businesses to deploy highly capable AI agents reliably, creating a new standard in customer experience.

   What You'll Do:
     * Build from scratch: Contribute to the development of new features and products. Bring your ideas and those of your team to life by designing and implementing backend services that drive our platform forward.
     * Architect & optimize: Help scale our architecture, including cloud-based services, REST APIs, and logging frameworks, ensuring high performance and reliability as we grow across multiple regions and workloads.
     * DevOps integration: Be hands-on with our DevOps setup, streamlining deployments, monitoring systems, and optimizing infrastructure for reliability and efficiency using cloud-based tools and CI/CD workflows.
     * Collaborate on technical roadmaps: Participate in designing the technical roadmap, working closely with the CTO and other engineers to shape the future of our product and backend ecosystem.
     * Security and monitoring: Ensure our systems are secure and robust by integrating monitoring and security tools, maintaining CI/CD pipelines, and implementing best practices for system reliability.

   Tech Stack You'll Be Working With:
     * Cloud platforms and deployment tools
     * FastAPI, React
     * Database technologies (e.g., PostgreSQL, Redis)
     * LLM providers
     * Monitoring and CI/CD tools (e.g., GitHub Actions, CodeCov)
     * REST APIs, Webhooks

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional backend engineering tasks like building APIs, scaling infrastructure, and database management. While it mentions AI capabilities and LLM providers, it lacks specific details on developing, fine-tuning, or deploying generative models, which are core to a GenAI Engineer role. The emphasis is on serving AI capabilities rather than building them.

phrases.phrase: drive the advancement of our tech stack and infrastructure
phrases.justification: This phrase indicates a need to understand how technical advancements align with the company's overall goals and infrastructure needs.

phrases.phrase: enables businesses to build, maintain and grow individually-tailored relationships with their customers efficiently at scale
phrases.justification: This describes the core business value proposition of the platform, requiring the engineer to understand the business context.

phrases.phrase: centralizes all company specific information, ranging from general information and real-time customer data to company policies, while providing full visibility and control over AI decision-making.
phrases.justification: Understanding the business's data and AI decision-making processes is crucial for building the backend infrastructure.

phrases.phrase: deploy highly capable AI agents reliably, creating a new standard in customer experience.
phrases.justification: This highlights the business outcome and strategic goal of the AI capabilities, which the backend engineer must support.

phrases.phrase: Collaborate on technical roadmaps: Participate in designing the technical roadmap, working closely with the CTO and other engineers to shape the future of our product and backend ecosystem.
phrases.justification: Designing a technical roadmap requires understanding business objectives and translating them into technical strategies.

phrases.phrase: Medior Backend Engineer
phrases.justification: The title itself indicates a focus on backend software development.

phrases.phrase: building, scaling and maintaining our backend infrastructure
phrases.justification: This directly describes core software development activities for backend systems.

phrases.phrase: contributing to product development, including launching new features and services from scratch.
phrases.justification: This involves the full software development lifecycle for new product components.

phrases.phrase: Build from scratch: Contribute to the development of new features and products. Bring your ideas and those of your team to life by designing and implementing backend services that drive our platform forward.
phrases.justification: This explicitly states the need to design and implement backend services, a fundamental software development task.

phrases.phrase: Architect & optimize: Help scale our architecture, including cloud-based services, REST APIs, and logging frameworks, ensuring high performance and reliability as we grow across multiple regions and workloads.
phrases.justification: Architecting and optimizing backend services, including REST APIs, is a key software development responsibility.

phrases.phrase: REST APIs, Webhooks
phrases.justification: These are specific technologies and patterns used in backend software development.

phrases.phrase: FastAPI
phrases.justification: FastAPI is a Python web framework for building APIs, a core software development tool.

phrases.phrase: React
phrases.justification: While often associated with frontend, React can be part of a full-stack development effort, and its mention suggests integration with backend services.

phrases.phrase: knowledge of DevOps (or a willingness to learn)
phrases.justification: Directly mentions DevOps, a key component of Operations Engineering.

phrases.phrase: DevOps integration: Be hands-on with our DevOps setup, streamlining deployments, monitoring systems, and optimizing infrastructure for reliability and efficiency using cloud-based tools and CI/CD workflows.
phrases.justification: This describes core DevOps activities like deployment, monitoring, and infrastructure optimization.

phrases.phrase: Security and monitoring: Ensure our systems are secure and robust by integrating monitoring and security tools, maintaining CI/CD pipelines, and implementing best practices for system reliability.
phrases.justification: Monitoring, CI/CD pipeline maintenance, and ensuring system reliability are all aspects of Operations Engineering.

phrases.phrase: Cloud platforms and deployment tools
phrases.justification: These are essential components for deploying and managing systems in production.

phrases.phrase: Monitoring and CI/CD tools (e.g., GitHub Actions, CodeCov)
phrases.justification: Specific tools used for continuous integration, continuous delivery, and monitoring.

phrases.phrase: join our engineering team
phrases.justification: Implies working collaboratively within a team.

phrases.phrase: working closely with the CTO and other engineers
phrases.justification: Highlights the need for collaboration with technical leadership and peers.

phrases.phrase: willingness to learn
phrases.justification: Explicitly states a need for continuous learning, particularly in DevOps.

phrases.phrase: fast-growing startup with big ambitions
phrases.justification: Suggests a dynamic environment where adaptability is key.

phrases.phrase: drive the advancement of our tech stack and infrastructure
phrases.justification: Requires problem-solving to identify and implement improvements.

phrases.phrase: scaling our architecture
phrases.justification: Scaling infrastructure involves complex problem-solving.

phrases.phrase: optimizing infrastructure for reliability and efficiency
phrases.justification: Optimization is a problem-solving activity focused on practical outcomes.

phrases.phrase: You are sure to be challenged with exciting challenges on a daily basis.
phrases.justification: Indicates a role that will present frequent problems to solve.

phrases.phrase: Build from scratch: Contribute to the development of new features and products. Bring your ideas and those of your team to life
phrases.justification: Encourages initiative and bringing personal ideas to fruition.

phrases.phrase: shape the future of our product and backend ecosystem
phrases.justification: Suggests taking ownership and influencing the direction of the technology.
